rows.label: qst104224_msg0002
rows.name:
The other day, the three of us tried
to go down to the shore, but...

rows.label: qst104224_msg0003
rows.name:
...a big rock had washed up,
and we couldn't get through.

rows.label: qst104224_msg0004
rows.name:
We tried pushing it with
all three of us, but it
wouldn't budge at all...

rows.label: qst104224_msg0005
rows.name:
Hummer-san and some other villagers
managed to move it somehow, but...

rows.label: qst104224_msg0006
rows.name:
Rex-sensei, can you move a
big rock like that easily?

rows.label: qst104224_msg0021
rows.name:
Of course! I can smash
any kind of rock!

rows.label: qst104224_msg0022
rows.name:
Wow! You'd smash it! I want
to try smashing one too.

rows.label: qst104224_msg0023
rows.name:
Don't be reckless... If
you get hurt, Correl-obasan
will get mad at me.

rows.label: qst104224_msg0024
rows.name: Okay! I'll do my best not to get hurt!

rows.label: qst104224_msg0025
rows.name:
Is that all for your question,
Kazuna? Next is Kukuri.

rows.label: qst104224_msg0041
rows.name:
Smashing it would be faster, but
a big rock might be difficult...

rows.label: qst104224_msg0042
rows.name:
I see... So we'd have to rely on
Hummer-san and the others then.

rows.label: qst104224_msg0043
rows.name:
Is that all for your question,
Kazuna? Next is Kukuri.
